title: Can't view ranked stats
body:
I can't view my ranked stats in-game, it's completely grayed out, I think it's been like this since the new ranked season started up, it could date back further than this however. 
Is this an issue for anyone else? any ideas on how to fix this?

replies.body: Same for me, i was wondering if they did it intentionally, but then i asked myself....why would they
Greyed out for me and everyone else i know as well lol
